## CounterStyleStatic.numericFromUnicodeRange property

Create a numeric multiplicative renderer from a unicode and a base. The set of numerals for this range will be generated by incrementing `originUnicode` with every integer in range \[0, `base` - 1\].

See https://www.w3.org/TR/css-counter-styles-3/\#numeric-system.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
numericFromUnicodeRange: (originUnicode: number, base: number) => CounterStyleRenderer;
```
